elements.text:
You have to give a presentation in a meeting today. When you stand up in front of the group, you feel your cheeks get hot and your hands start to tremble.

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

text: I've done everything I can to prepare for this presentation.
It's normal to feel a little warm when you're anxious about presenting.
Everyone will see that my hands are shaking.
I want to cover my face, but know I can do this even if it's uncomfortable.
I want to sit back down, but decide to go forward with the presentation knowing my hard work will pay off.
